shlok_hindi: ऊर्ध्वं गच्छन्ति सत्त्वस्था मध्ये तिष्ठन्ति राजसाः ।
shlok_hinglish: ūrdhvaṃ gacchanti sattvasthā madhye tiṣṭhanti rājasāḥ
shlok_english: Those who are abiding in SATTWA go upwards; the RAJASIC dwell in the middle; and the TAMASIC, abiding in the function of the lowest GUNA, go downwards.

defs.meaning: those situated in the mode of goodness
those situated in the mode of passion
persons in the mode of ignorance.
